.entry-header
Acerca de SG Communities
About
SG Communities
Dedicated to building strong communities.
View Communities
Management
Team
Sam
Hales
Founder & CEO
Sam
Hales
Founder & CEO
Private Equity Real Estate fund manager with $360M+ AUM and Founder of the Saratoga Group. Sam has 15 years of Real Estate and Management experience in distressed asset workouts, land development, redevelopment, single family and mobile home communities.
About Sam
DJ
Birnie
Chief Financial Officer
DJ
Birnie
Chief Financial Officer
DJ Birnie is a long-time investor in Saratoga Group. He has a proven track record as a seasoned investor in many real estate deals and leads with extensive industry knowledge. Prior to his joining Saratoga Group, DJ has held roles as CFO and management consultant.
About DJ
Shawn
Felkley
Chief People Officer
Shawn
Felkley
Chief People Officer
Shawn is a trusted advisor in people operations with over 25 years of experience. Prior to Saratoga, she was VP of Human Resources for 4 years for a Real Estate & Development firm with $884M+ in assets. She has championed people operations for up to 3,000 members nationwide.
About Shawn
Steve
Sacher
Chief Operating Officer
Steve
Sacher
Chief Operating Officer
Steve is passionate about developing a strong company culture that leads to increased engagement and performance.  Since Saratoga's beginnings in 2017, Steve has had significant success in transforming distressed mobile home parks into thriving communities.
About Steve
Scott
Bross
General Counsel
Scott
Bross
General Counsel
Scott has over 15 years of legal expertise. Most recently, serving as VP, Legal Counsel at a global real estate firm overseeing all real estate legal matters. Scott holds a J.D. and M.B.A. from Pepperdine University, along with a dual B.A. in Economics and Sociology from Duke University.
About Scott
Our Purpose
Statement
Unleashing opportunity for our residents, employees, and investors by
Building Community
through the development of clean, safe, and attainable housing solutions.
Core
Values
Integrity:
Honesty at all costs
.
Servant Leadership:
Service
>
Self
Grit:
Git'er Done!
Extreme Ownership:
What if it was your company?
Best Shot Attitude:
You can't always be
THE BEST
, but you can always give it
YOUR
BEST SHOT
.
Abundance Mentality:
Let's bake a bigger pie!
SG Communities
Supports Healthy
Neighborhoods
The team at SG Communities is dedicated to building communities you can be proud to call home. Every resident should feel welcomed in their community, and we take our role in that process seriously. SG Communities is committed to the details that help create a sense of community. We believe that amenities like soccer fields, playgrounds, basic security features, etc. are as important to building a solid community as the homes themselves. This commitment also means that we are involved in each community we’re a part of - serving on the local hospital board or running finances for kids soccer leagues. This gives us a deeper understanding of your community and needs.
.entry-content .clear
